sentence.Network_en: Such conduct will derogate from your reputation.
sentence.Network_cn: 那样的行为有损你的名誉.

sentence.Network_en: Statutes are not to be presumed to derogate from international law.
sentence.Network_cn: 不能认为制定法贬损国际法.

sentence.Network_en: The parties may not derogate from or vary the effect of this article.
sentence.Network_cn: 各当事人不得减损本条或改变其效力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 贬字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 贬价〖 reduceaprice〗 贬损〖 derogate〗 贬义〖 derogatorysense〗.
赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... interrogate v 审问 derogate 贬低 surrogate 替代品， 代理人.

list.abs: Disparage诽谤，蔑视Derogatory derogate 贬低诽谤Denigrate 诋毁污蔑
a word with a derogative tincture ., 有贬义色彩的词.

people often derogate others in social comparison and the past selves in temporal comparison , so that they can achieve self-enhancement and ultimately get good self-feelings .在社会比较中人们会贬低他人，在时间比较中人们会贬低过去的自我，从而来达到提高自我，最终使现在的自我感觉良好。
derogation of intensity of sound in measuring sound velocity by resonance interference method共振干涉法声速测定中声强减损的讨论

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin derogat- 'abrogated', from the verb derogare, from de- 'aside, away' + rogare 'ask'

auth_sentence.content: We learn to...derogate the conventional speech of the working class...as...sloppy and impoverished.
auth_sentence.res_content: We learn to...derogate the conventional speech of the working class...as...sloppy and impoverished.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We learn to...derogate the conventional speech of the working class...as...sloppy and impoverished.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ar一再+rog要求,问+ant……的→一再要求的→傲慢的
derogate[v.贬低,诽谤]+ory……的→adj.不敬的,诽谤的
ar一再+rog要求,问+ance表名词→一再要的→arrogance傲慢
pre预先+rog要求+ative……的→预先要求→[有]特权
ab去掉+rog要求,问+ate表动词→不再要求有→取消掉
ar一再+rog要求+ate表动词→一再要求→硬是说
de向下,坏+rog要求,问+ate表动词→坏坏的问下去→贬低
inter在……中间+rog要求,问+ate表动词→在[审问室]中问→审问
pro前+rog要求,问+ue→提前问好[下次开会日期]→休会
sur下面+rog要求+ate使……→v.使代理, 使代替

sentences.en: Such conduct will derogate from your reputation.
sentences.cn: 那样的行为有损你的名誉。
